Bradford's Law and the Bibliography of Science .A Brookes, B.C. The rationalization of scientific library systems might be greatly facilitated by the application of Bradford's law, formulated more than twenty years ago. .X 19	1	1085 36	1	1085 37	1	1085 39	2	1085 40	1	1085 41	1	1085 47	1	1085 55	3	1085 57	1	1085 62	1	1085 88	1	1085 89	1	1085 97	1	1085 98	1	1085 100	1	1085 102	2	1085 103	2	1085 107	1	1085 111	1	1085 128	1	1085 129	1	1085 130	1	1085 149	1	1085 167	1	1085 175	1	1085 184	1	1085 193	1	1085 195	1	1085 196	1	1085 201	1	1085 203	1	1085 204	1	1085 205	1	1085 215	1	1085 219	1	1085 221	1	1085 223	1	1085 225	1	1085 228	1	1085 229	1	1085 233	2	1085 234	1	1085 253	1	1085 267	1	1085 280	1	1085 313	1	1085 359	13	1085 361	1	1085 377	1	1085 378	1	1085 379	3	1085 393	1	1085 395	2	1085 468	1	1085 487	1	1085 494	2	1085 505	2	1085 515	1	1085 560	1	1085 573	3	1085 587	2	1085 592	1	1085 602	1	1085 616	1	1085 618	2	1085 632	1	1085 635	2	1085 639	1	1085 646	1	1085 647	1	1085 651	1	1085 667	2	1085 744	1	1085 747	1	1085 748	8	1085 749	1	1085 750	2	1085 751	8	1085 759	2	1085 764	1	1085 765	6	1085 767	1	1085 777	2	1085 778	7	1085 782	1	1085 787	3	1085 788	1	1085 791	5	1085 792	3	1085 793	1	1085 800	2	1085 804	3	1085 805	1	1085 818	1	1085 822	1	1085 823	1	1085 827	1	1085 840	1	1085 889	1	1085 893	4	1085 925	1	1085 943	1	1085 944	1	1085 952	1	1085 1016	4	1085 1030	1	1085 1061	1	1085 1062	1	1085 1070	1	1085 1071	1	1085 1081	1	1085 1082	1	1085 1083	7	1085 1084	1	1085 1085	25	1085 1086	8	1085 1087	2	1085 1088	1	1085 1090	2	1085 1123	1	1085 1142	1	1085 1147	1	1085 1172	1	1085 1182	3	1085 1200	2	1085 1201	4	1085 1222	1	1085 1274	1	1085 1277	1	1085 1278	2	1085 1280	1	1085 1282	1	1085 1285	4	1085 1287	1	1085 1291	1	1085 1296	1	1085 1301	2	1085 1302	4	1085 1304	1	1085 1313	1	1085 1337	1	1085 1338	2	1085 1341	1	1085 1344	1	1085 1347	1	1085 1352	1	1085 1374	1	1085 1380	2	1085 1390	1	1085 1401	2	1085 1417	1	1085 1418	3	1085 1428	1	1085 1437	1	1085 1444	1	1085 1444	1	1085
